tutorial: ^Bailiff! Take him away immediately unless he wishes to face charges of court misconduct.
^Gosh, I hope the prosecution gets me a fat paycheck for all the extra work they put me through…
^You call yourself a judge, yet all you do is take bribes.
^(First, I have the worst munchies, and now I start seeing things.)
^I am not a "talking gavel". My name is Václav, Václav The Gavel.
^Perhaps you know me better as the Spirit of Justice.
^I have come to stop your corrupt ways!
^By doing what, exactly? Speaking in a funny voice?
^I sentence you to sit in this exact courtroom and solve cases until you repent from the bottom of your heart!
^Hey, who said you can read my thoughts?
^Let us add some challenge. Do not pass a false verdict.
^I see that you are still a long way from true repentance.
^I shall add a timer as well.
^While we are at it, let us review your last defendant's verdict.
^Analyze their case properly and then swipe their profile left or right. Your kind must be familliar with this.

c-0: ^Are you going to sit here all day and do nothing?
^I have a whole country's worth of corrupt judges like you.
^Let us do this again from the start.
c-1: ^Are you sure you made the right choice?

finale: ^See? Doesn't it feel good to pass a proper verdict?
^Now you can finally get on the path to redemption.
^Who knows, perhaps one day you shall get freed from this courtroom.
